Title: Titan Construction Transforms Aging Bowling Alley into Modern Fitness Facility
Summary: WEST ORANGE, NJ â€” Thanks in part to the invention of the automatic pinsetter, the 1950s saw a bowling craze sweep the nation. At its peak, more than 20 million Americans were regular bowlers, and bowling alleys, such as Eagle Rock Lanes in West Orange, NJ, were popping up in major cities like mushrooms.
